replacement.note: Higher values capture more paragraphs but increase resource consumption

lazyLoading.title: Lazy Loading Translation
lazyLoading.description: Translate paragraphs only when they are scrolled into view, reducing resource consumption and improving performance.
lazyLoading.preloadDistanceHint: Higher values can capture more paragraphs but will increase resource consumption. Recommended range: 50%-100%
lazyLoading.performanceHintEnabled: Lazy loading is enabled. Content will be translated on-demand as you scroll, effectively reducing memory usage and improving page load speed.
lazyLoading.performanceHintDisabled: Lazy loading is disabled. The entire page will be translated at once. It's recommended to enable lazy loading on content-heavy pages.
lazyLoading.note: Higher values capture more paragraphs but increase resource consumption

api.note: Note: API keys are saved locally and never sent anywhere else.
api.manageConfig: To manage configurations, please open the settings center.

websiteManagement.title: Website Management
websiteManagement.description: Manage website rules for the translation feature. Blacklist disables translation, Whitelist forces automatic translation.
websiteManagement.startAddingRules: Start adding website rules to manage translation behavior
websiteManagement.confirmDeleteRule: Are you sure you want to delete this rule?
websiteManagement.confirmDeleteSelected: Are you sure you want to delete the selected {count} rules?

websiteRuleDialog.descriptionPlaceholder: Add a note for this rule...
websiteRuleDialog.invalidPattern: Please enter a valid URL pattern

whitelist.label: Whitelist
whitelist.description: Websites where automatic translation is forced

basicSettings.title: Basic Settings
basicSettings.enableExtensionDescription: When turned off, all translation features will stop working.
basicSettings.interfaceLanguageDescription: Select the display language for the extension's interface.
basicSettings.customCSSHint: Tip: The CSS styles here will be applied to the translated text. Please write the style properties directly without selectors.
basicSettings.previewText: This is a sample text containing the

lazyLoading.title: Lazy Loading Settings
lazyLoading.description: Translate paragraphs only when they are scrolled into view, reducing resource consumption and improving performance.
lazyLoading.preloadDistanceHint: Higher values can capture more paragraphs but will increase resource consumption. Recommended range: 50%-100%
lazyLoading.performanceHintEnabled: Lazy loading is enabled. Content will be translated on-demand as you scroll, effectively reducing memory usage and improving page load speed.
lazyLoading.performanceHintDisabled: Lazy loading is disabled. The entire page will be translated at once. It's recommended to enable lazy loading on content-heavy pages.

hotkeySettings.title: Hotkey Settings
hotkeySettings.translatePageDescription: Press the hotkey to translate all text content on the current page.
hotkeySettings.quickTranslateDescription: Quickly translate all text on the current page.
hotkeySettings.modifyInstructions: Click the "Manage Hotkeys" button above, or visit chrome://extensions/shortcuts to customize key combinations.
hotkeySettings.pleaseSetHotkey: Please set a hotkey to enable this feature.
hotkeySettings.clickManageButton: ðŸ’¡ Click the "Manage Hotkeys" button above to set it, or visit
hotkeySettings.clickCheckButton: Click the "Check Status" button to verify the hotkey settings.

translationSettings.title: Translation Service Configuration
translationSettings.timeoutDescription: Set the maximum waiting time for all API requests. Enter
translationSettings.timeoutPlaceholder: Enter timeout in seconds, 0 for unlimited
translationSettings.noConfigMessage: No configurations yet. Click the "Add Configuration" button above to create one.
translationSettings.requestsPerSecondDescription: Set the maximum number of API requests per second. 0 means no limit. It is recommended to set an appropriate limit to avoid API 429 errors.
translationSettings.enableThinkingModeDescription: Controls whether to enable the AI's thinking process output.
translationSettings.includeThinkingParamDescription: Controls whether the enable_thinking parameter is sent to the API (some models do not support this parameter).
translationSettings.sendRequestThroughBackgroundDescription: Enable this option to bypass CORS restrictions, suitable for inaccessible API services. It is recommended to enable this if you encounter cross-domain errors.
translationSettings.customApiParamsDescription: Supports adding extra API parameters like top_p, presence_penalty, etc. (in JSON format).
translationSettings.systemParamsNote: System parameters such as model, messages, apiKey, etc., will be protected by the system and will not be overwritten.

errors.fillRequiredFields: Please fill in the configuration name and API key

about.title: About Immersive Language Learning Helper (illa-helper)
about.logoAlt: Immersive Language Learning Helper illa-helper Logo
about.description: Immersive Language Learning Helper (illa-helper) is a browser extension based on the 'i+1' comprehensible input theory, designed to help you learn foreign languages easily and efficiently during your daily browsing through an immersive translation and pronunciation learning ecosystem.

smartTranslation.title: Smart Translation & Vocabulary Replacement
smartTranslation.description: Supports over 20 languages and intelligently selects vocabulary based on your level.

pronunciation.title: Pronunciation Learning Ecosystem
pronunciation.description: Integrates phonetics, AI word definitions, and dual TTS voice reading for a one-stop pronunciation learning experience.

learningStyles.title: Multiple Learning Styles
learningStyles.description: Offers 7 different translation styles (e.g., underline, highlight, blur) to meet personalized learning needs.

interactive.title: Interactive Floating Box
interactive.description: Hover to view detailed pronunciation and definitions of words and phrases, with support for nested lookups.

about.latestVersion: You are on the latest version
about.supportDescription: Your support is our motivation to keep improving! If you find this extension useful, feel free to give us a star on GitHub or contribute to the development.

exportSettings.title: Export Settings
exportSettings.description: Export all your current settings to a JSON file, including user configurations, API settings, and website management rules. You can save this file as a backup or import it on other devices.
exportSettings.success: Settings exported successfully! Included {count} website rules.
exportSettings.error: Export failed. Please check the console for details.

importSettings.title: Import Settings
importSettings.description: Import settings from a JSON file, including user configurations and website management rules. Please note: This will overwrite all your current settings. Both new and old formats are supported; old formats will only import user settings.
importSettings.error: Import failed. The file format may be incorrect.
importSettings.readError: An error occurred while reading the file.

pronunciationTooltip.title: Floating Definition Box Settings
pronunciationTooltip.description: Show word meaning and pronunciation when hovering over translated text.
pronunciationTooltip.hotkeyDescription: Show definition box only when holding Ctrl and hovering.
